property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 1. Begin by getting some cooking basics in place.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 1

property.name: description_key
property.value: Collect some stone, craft a Campfire, and place it for use.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 1. Begin by getting some cooking basics in place.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Cooking Pot Party

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 1

property.name: description_key
property.value: Acquire a Cooking Pot for your Campfire, and ingredients to make Bacon and Eggs with Biscuits.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 1. Begin by getting some cooking basics in place.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Acorn Flour

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 1

property.name: description_key
property.value: Make 5 Acorn Flour in preparation for Acorn Biscuits.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 1. Begin by getting some cooking basics in place.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Acorn Biscuits

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 1

property.name: description_key
property.value: Make 5 Acorn Biscuits in preparation for Bacon and Eggs with Biscuits.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 1. Begin by getting some cooking basics in place.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bacon and Eggs with Biscuits

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 1

property.name: description_key
property.value: Unlock and cook Bacon and Eggs with Biscuits. Place 5 Bacon and Eggs with Biscuits into your inventory. This preparation task gives you some surplus while you loot, shoot, and continue your additional tasks. Receive XP, 2 Skill Points and a Cooking Grill for your efforts. Continue to Part 2.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 2. Place a Forge, and gather some resources for Pipe Weapons and Ammo. Finally, make a Stone Spear.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 2

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft, loot, or purchase a Forge. Place it.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 2. Place a Forge, and gather some resources for Pipe Weapons and Ammo. Finally, make a Stone Spear.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Pipe Weapons

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 2

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft, loot, or purchase a Pipe Pistol, Pipe Machine Gun, Pipe Rifle, and Pipe Shotgun and place into your inventory. Remove Mods on existing weapons to count.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 2. Place a Forge, and gather some resources for Pipe Weapons and Ammo. Finally, make a Stone Spear.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 2

property.name: description_key
property.value: Collect some Coal and Potassium Nitrate Powder to make 50 Gunpowder on your person.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 2. Place a Forge, and gather some resources for Pipe Weapons and Ammo. Finally, make a Stone Spear.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Iron Arrows

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 2

property.name: description_key
property.value: Unlock a Forge to craft 50 Iron Arrowheads. You may also loot or purchase them. Use 50 Iron Arrowheads, Wood, and Feathers to make 50 Iron Arrows on your person.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 2. Place a Forge, and gather some resources for Pipe Weapons and Ammo. Finally, make a Stone Spear.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Stone Spear

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 2

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft a Stone Spear. It helps to keep hostiles at a distance, especially when health is low. Receive XP, 2 Skill Points, and a Weapon Maintenance Mod as a reward. Continue to Part 3.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 3. Place a Workbench, followed by Farm Plots, a Coop and Hive, and then Traps.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 3

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft, loot, or purchase a Workbench. Place it.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 3. Place a Workbench, followed by Farm Plots, a Coop and Hive, and then Traps.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Quality of Life

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 3

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft and place a Chicken Coop, Bee Hive, 4 Farm Plots, Wood Burning Prepper Stove, and Fish Trap. Ensure you place the correct types. Caution! Do not add any Caught Chicks, Queen Bees, or Bait yet. That comes in the next stage of Part 3.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 3. Place a Workbench, followed by Farm Plots, a Coop and Hive, and then Traps.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Chicks, Queens, and Bait

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 3

property.name: description_key
property.value: Find 2 Caught Chicks from Birds' Nests or Trees, and 1 Queen Bee from a Tree or Stumps. Craft Bait for the Fish Trap. Add them to the Coop, Hive, and Fish Trap when ready.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 3. Place a Workbench, followed by Farm Plots, a Coop and Hive, and then Traps.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 3

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft and place 2 Tar Traps and 1 Cactus Trap with the Workbench.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 3. Place a Workbench, followed by Farm Plots, a Coop and Hive, and then Traps.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Chicken, Honey Comb, and Catfish

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 3

property.name: description_key
property.value: Farm 3 Grown Domestic Chickens, 15 Honey Comb, and 1 Catfish. Receive XP, 2 Skill Points, and a Bunker Buster Mod as a reward. Continue to Part 4.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 4. Mine for Oil Shale, and convert to Gas Cans and Drill Gas Cans on the Chemistry Station. Craft, place, and power up a Prepper Rock Drill to collect additional mining resources.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Oil Shale

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 4

property.name: description_key
property.value: Mine 2000 Oil Shale from the Desert Biome in preparation for converting to fuel.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 4. Mine for Oil Shale, and convert to Gas Cans and Drill Gas Cans on the Chemistry Station. Craft, place, and power up a Prepper Rock Drill to collect additional mining resources.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Chemistry Table

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 4

property.name: description_key
property.value: Unlock, procure, or be rewarded a Chemistry Station and place it for the next stage.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 4. Mine for Oil Shale, and convert to Gas Cans and Drill Gas Cans on the Chemistry Station. Craft, place, and power up a Prepper Rock Drill to collect additional mining resources.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 4

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft 8888 Gas Cans and 5 Drill Gas Cans from Shale Oil on the Chemistry Station. If you have already looted some Gas Cans, they will add to the total.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 4. Mine for Oil Shale, and convert to Gas Cans and Drill Gas Cans on the Chemistry Station. Craft, place, and power up a Prepper Rock Drill to collect additional mining resources.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Rock Drill

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 4

property.name: description_key
property.value: Unlock and craft a Prepper Rock Drill on the Workbench and place it. Use a Drill Gas Can to power it.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 4. Mine for Oil Shale, and convert to Gas Cans and Drill Gas Cans on the Chemistry Station. Craft, place, and power up a Prepper Rock Drill to collect additional mining resources.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 4

property.name: description_key
property.value: Drill for the requested resources. Receive XP, 2 Skill Points, and a Diamond Blade Tip Mod as a reward. This concludes the Prepper Stockpile Challenges.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this quest to eliminate 500 Zombies through multiple smaller stages. Eliminate 10 in the first stage for 500 Dukes, 15 for 1500 XP, 25 for 1250 Dukes, 50 for 5000 XP, 75 for 3750 Dukes, 125 for 12500 XP, and 200 for 2 Skill Points. This Quest repeats in an endless loop.

property.value: 10 Zombies

property.value: 10 Zombies

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this quest to hunt a variety of animals through multiple smaller stages. You will receive Dukes and XP for completing each stage, and 2 Skill for the final stage. This Quest repeats in an endless loop.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Chickens and Rabbits

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Chickens and Rabbits

property.name: description_key
property.value: Hunt 4 Chickens and 4 Rabbits to receive a reward and move to the next animal stage.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this quest to hunt a variety of animals through multiple smaller stages. You will receive Dukes and XP for completing each stage, and 2 Skill for the final stage. This Quest repeats in an endless loop.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Does, Boars, Wolves, and Coyotes

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Does, Boars, Wolves, and Coyotes

property.name: description_key
property.value: Hunt 3 Does, 3 Boars, 3 Wolves, and 3 Coyotes to receive a reward and move to the next animal stage.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this quest to hunt a variety of animals through multiple smaller stages. You will receive Dukes and XP for completing each stage, and 2 Skill for the final stage. This Quest repeats in an endless loop.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bears, M Lions, Stags, and Paindeer

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Bears, M Lions, Stags, and Paindeer

property.name: description_key
property.value: Hunt 2 Bears, 2 Mountain Lions, 2 Stags, and 2 Paindeer to receive a reward and move to the next animal stage.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this quest to hunt a variety of animals through multiple smaller stages. You will receive Dukes and XP for completing each stage, and 2 Skill Points for the final stage. This Quest repeats in an endless loop.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Z Bear, Bad Bunny, B Chicken, Dire Wolf, and G.I. Grace

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Z Bear, Bad Bunny, B Chicken, Dire Wolf, and G.I. Grace

property.name: description_key
property.value: Hunt a Zombie Bear, Bad Bunny, Battle Chicken, Dire Wolf, and G.I. Grace to receive a reward and restart the animal stages.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the I.V. Stand Challenge. Unlock and Craft an I.V. A Screamer Scout will smell the delightful aroma and visit the location. Eliminate her before she invites her friends. Pick up the I.V. Stand to stop any more Screamer Scouts from appearing. Receive 2 Skill Points for eliminating 100 Screamer Scouts. This quest continually loops.

property.name: name_key
property.value: I.V. Stand

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: I.V. Stand

property.name: description_key
property.value: Unlock and Craft an I.V. A Screamer Scout will smell the delightful aroma and visit the location. Eliminate her before she invites her friends. Pick up the I.V. Stand to stop any more Screamer Scouts from appearing.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the I.V. Stand Challenge. Unlock and Craft an I.V. A Screamer Scout will smell the delightful aroma and visit the location. Eliminate her before she invites her friends. Pick up the I.V. Stand to stop any more Screamer Scouts from appearing. Receive 2 Skill Points for eliminating 100 Screamer Scouts. This quest continually loops.
